newsitem.title: USA: Wit Capital buys Global Trade software.
newsitem.headline: Wit Capital buys Global Trade software.

text.p: Private Wit Capital Corp said it bought electronic trading software from Global Trade Inc.
The software seeks to enable direct electronic matching of buy and sell orders through the Internet.
Wit said that Chris Keith, who owns Global Trade, will join Wit. Keith previously served as chief of technology at the New York Stock Exchange.
Wit was started by Andrew Klein, who owns Spring Street Brewing Co, a microbrewery that was brought public via the Internet last year.
